scripts.start: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=dev node ./dist/app.js
scripts.build: npm run clear  && tsc  &&  cp -r src/public dist/public
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npx mocha --require intelli-espower-loader dist/test/simple/**/*.test.js
scripts.test:one: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npx mocha --require intelli-espower-loader dist/test/simple/**/raceService.test.js
scripts.test:race: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npx mocha --require intelli-espower-loader dist/test/simple/**/raceService.test.js
scripts.test-handle: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npx mocha --require intelli-espower-loader dist/test/handle/**/*.test.js
scripts.test-handle:raceAdmin: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npx mocha --require intelli-espower-loader dist/test/handle/raceAdminRouter.test.js
scripts.test-handle:db: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npx mocha --require intelli-espower-loader dist/test/handle/db.test.js
